status.restricted-by-ip: This audit result is not allowed to access from your IP address.
status.restricted-by-password: This audit result is protected by password.
status.not-found: The audit result you were trying to access doesn't exist or has been removed.
status.unknown-error: Something is technically wrong with the server.

status.unscheduled: Schedule a scan for the target.
status.scheduled: Wait for completion of scheduled scan.
status.failure: Failed to scan the target, schedule a scan again.
status.unsafe: Severe vulnerabilities has been detected. Please respond to the vulnerabilities.

revocation.title: Revoke this page
revocation.message-1: You won't be able to access this page again.

contacts.title: Change contacts
contacts.message: Register name and e-mail address of contact persons.
contacts.name: Name
contacts.error-invalid-email: {email} is not an valid e-mail address.

access-restriction.title: Restrict access to this page
access-restriction.message: Specify access control to be applied for this page.
access-restriction.error-invalid-password: Specify password that length is more than or equals to {minLength} .

status.audit-id-not-found: Specified audit ID doesn't exist or has been removed.
status.target-is-private-ip: Private IP address is not allowed.
status.target-is-not-fqdn-or-ipv4: Specified scan target is not a FQDN or an IP address.

audit-status-bar.submit-ready: Severe vulnerabilities could not be found.
audit-status-bar.submit-completed: This audit result has been submitted.
audit-status-bar.vulnerability-found: Severe vulnerabilities has been detected. Fix and scan, or write reason why you don't need to fix.
audit-status-bar.submission-failure: Failed to submit the audit result.
audit-status-bar.withdrawal-failure: Failed to withdraw the audit result.
audit-status-bar.withdrawal-confirmation: Are you sure you want to withdraw the submission of this audit result?
